ViewObject.Name: XwrlRequestsView
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
SELECT XwrlRequests.ID, XwrlRequests.master_id, XwrlRequests.alias_id, XwrlRequests.xref_id, XwrlRequests.RESUBMIT_ID, XwrlRequests.SOURCE_TABLE, XwrlRequests.SOURCE_ID, XwrlRequests.WC_SCREENING_REQUEST_ID, XwrlRequests.SERVER, XwrlRequests.JOB_ID, XwrlRequests.STATUS, XwrlRequests.ERROR_CODE, XwrlRequests.ERROR_MESSAGE, XwrlRequests.CASE_ID, XwrlRequests.NAME_SCREENED, XwrlRequests.DATE_OF_BIRTH, XwrlRequests.IMO_NUMBER, XwrlRequests.VESSEL_INDICATOR, XwrlRequests.PATH, XwrlRequests.CASE_STATE, XwrlRequests.CASE_WORKFLOW, XwrlRequests.CASE_STATUS, XwrlRequests.PRIORITY, XwrlRequests.RISK_LEVEL, XwrlRequests.REJECTION_REASON, XwrlRequests.MATCHES, XwrlRequests.DEPARTMENT, XwrlRequests.OFFICE, XwrlRequests.DOCUMENT_TYPE, XwrlRequests.DOCUMENT_TYPE As DocType, XwrlRequests.ASSIGNED_TO, XwrlRequests.COUNTRY_OF_RESIDENCE, XwrlRequests.CITY_OF_RESIDENCE, XwrlRequests.SUBDIVISION_CITY_OF_RESIDENCE, XwrlRequests.CLOSED_DATE, XwrlRequests.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XwrlRequests.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XwrlRequests.CREATION_DATE, XwrlRequests.CREATED_BY, XwrlRequests.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, XwrlRequests.BATCH_ID, XwrlRequests.COUNTRY_OF_ADDRESS, XwrlRequests.COUNTRY_OF_NATIONALITY, XwrlRequests.COUNTRY_OF_OPERATION, XwrlRequests.COUNTRY_OF_BIRTH, XwrlRequests.COUNTRY_OF_REGISTRATION, XwrlRequests.CITY_OF_RESIDENCE_ID, XwrlRequests.REJECTION_REASON_OTHR, -- XwrlRequests.VERSION_ID, decode(XwrlRequests.path,'INDIVIDUAL',(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Xwrl_Response_Ind_Columns IC WHERE IC.REQUEST_ID = XwrlRequests.ID AND IC.X_STATE LIKE '%Open%'), 'ENTITY', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Xwrl_Response_ENTITY_Columns EC WHERE EC.REQUEST_ID = XwrlRequests.ID AND EC.X_STATE LIKE '%Open%')) as Opencnt, decode(XwrlRequests.path,'INDIVIDUAL',(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Xwrl_Response_Ind_Columns IC WHERE IC.REQUEST_ID = XwrlRequests.ID AND IC.X_STATE LIKE '%Possible%'), 'ENTITY', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Xwrl_Response_ENTITY_Columns EC WHERE EC.REQUEST_ID = XwrlRequests.ID AND EC.X_STATE LIKE '%Possible%')) as Possiblecnt, decode(XwrlRequests.path,'INDIVIDUAL',(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Xwrl_Response_Ind_Columns IC WHERE IC.REQUEST_ID = XwrlRequests.ID AND IC.LEGAL_REVIEW = 'Y'), 'ENTITY', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Xwrl_Response_ENTITY_Columns EC WHERE EC.REQUEST_ID = XwrlRequests.ID AND EC.LEGAL_REVIEW = 'Y')) as LegalReviewcnt, NVL(XwrlRequests.DEPARTMENT_EXT,(SELECT VALUE_STRING FROM XWRL_PARAMETERS WHERE ID = 'CASE_DEPARTMENTS' AND DISPLAY_FLAG = 'Y' AND KEY = XwrlRequests.DEPARTMENT)) as DepartmentExt ,XwrlRequests.sent_to_legal_date ,XwrlRequests.ADDRESS_CONFIRMATION_DATE ,XwrlRequests.sent_to_legal_by ,(case XwrlRequests.SOURCE_TABLE when 'SICD_SEAFARERS' then RMI_OWS_COMMON_UTIL.ACTUAL_FIN(XwrlRequests.SOURCE_ID) else null end) as FinNumber ,(case XwrlRequests.SOURCE_TABLE when 'CORP_MAIN' then RMI_OWS_COMMON_UTIL.GET_CORP_NUMBER(XwrlRequests.SOURCE_ID) else '' end) as CorpNumber, (select ESR_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS_ID from ESR_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS where ESR_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS_ID=SOURCE_ID and department='CORP' and document_type='ESR') as ESR_USER_ID, (select email_address from ESR_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS where ESR_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS_ID=SOURCE_ID and department='CORP' and document_type='ESR') as ESR_USER_EMAIL_ADDRESS,
(select ERB_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS_ID from RMI_ERB_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS where ERB_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS_ID=SOURCE_ID and department='VESDOC' and document_type='ERB') as ERB_USER_ID, (select CONTACT_EMAIL from RMI_ERB_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS where ERB_REQUEST_USER_DETAILS_ID=SOURCE_ID and department='VESDOC' and document_type='ERB') as ERB_USER_EMAIL_ADDRESS
-- ,XwrlRequests.WRKFLOW_STATUS_LEGAL_NTFD -- ,XwrlRequests.WRKFLOW_STATUS_LEGAL_NTFD_DT ,XwrlRequests.GENDER ,XwrlRequests.PASSPORT_NUMBER ,(select permanent_address from xwrl_party_master where id = RMI_OWS_COMMON_UTIL.get_master_id(master_id, alias_id, xref_id)) as PERMANENT_ADDRESS ,decode(XwrlRequests.provisional_request,'Y','Yes','N','No') as PROVISIONAL_REQUEST FROM XWRL_REQUESTS XwrlRequests order by XwrlRequests.BATCH_ID desc,XwrlRequests.CREATION_DATE desc
